metadata.name: Google Workspace Granted Domain API Access
metadata.comment: Detects when an API access service account is granted domain authority.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM entity_management WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('admin.googleapis.com') AND lower(api.operation) = lower('authorize_api_client_access'))

output.summary: Detects when an API access service account is granted domain authority.
